name: Charo
description:
Charo is a 2D survival game in which you play a raven that must eat to survive

Be careful of the projectiles that cross the field and that will leave you no rest.

Timothé COURTIER : Game Designer - Graph

Anthony VALENTINE : Game Designer

Ulysse RAYON : Game Designer

Clarence BERARD : Game Programmer

Adrien JEN : Game Programmer

Abdelkader VANDAMME : Game Programmer
